title: The Messengers: Laurie Lee
creator_credit: Granada Television International and Pauline Shaw
brief_description: Laurie Lee is interviews in Gloucester, England where he spent his childhood. He speaks of the early influence that made him take up writing and the autobiographical details involved in “Cider with Rosie”. Passages of this are read, accompanied by views of this valley where Lee grew up.
